abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.
abort.webhook_not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive webhook messages.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup the webhook feature in Plaato Airlock.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

user.title: Do you want to start set up?

data.token: The Auth Token obtained from Plaato
data.use_webhook: Enable to use webhook for the Airlock
data.use_keg: Enable if you have a Keg
data.use_airlock: Enable if you have an Airlock
